text: The Train for Venice () is a 1938 French comedy film directed by André Berthomieu and starring Max Dearly, Victor Boucher, and Louis Verneuil. It is based on a play written by Verneuil and Georges Berr. ==Partial cast== * Max Dearly - Chardonne * Victor Boucher - Etienne de Boisrobert * Louis Verneuil - Michel Ancelot * Claire Olivier - Suzanne * Huguette Duflos - Caroline Ancelot * Pierre Etchepare - d'Aubigny * Madeleine Suffel - Berthe * Roger Vieuille - Amédée ==References== ==External links== * Category:1938 films Category:French films Category:1938 comedy films Category:French-language films Category:French films based on plays Category:Films based on works by Louis Verneuil Category:Films directed by André Berthomieu Category:French black-and-white films Category:French comedy films
title: The Train for Venice
